sentences.english: However, the moonlit glare washes this rather faint constellation from the sky tonight.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，月光洗去了今晚天际中星星们昏暗的光。

sentences.english: Sorry, we are all booked up (fully booked, full) tonight.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，今晚的房间已被定满。

sentences.english: You're looking at a guy who could very well get stood up by a stray cat tonight.
sentences.chinese: 在你面前是一位今晚很可能被流浪猫放鸽子的男士。

sentences.english: You want to find your sister tonight, I advise you to look in the Boylan Estate.
sentences.chinese: 今晚你想要找你姐姐，我劝你到博伊兰庄园去找。

sentences.english: They asked me for my impressions of the fair tonight.
sentences.chinese: 他们约请我今晚去谈谈对交易会的印象。

sentences.english: The people working here tonight have no beef with the picket line .
sentences.chinese: 今晚在这里上工的人与游行罢工的人并无芥蒂。

sentences.english: The planet Jupiter blazes near the waxing gibbous moon tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚光辉四溢的木星和月亮拉近了距离。

sentences.english: We can hut on the mountain tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚我们可以住在山上的棚屋里。

sentences.english: If you finish these tasks,we can go to a movie tonight.
sentences.chinese: 如果你完成了这些任务，今晚我们就能去看电影。

sentences.english: A whole gang of builders is there tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚整队建筑工人都在那儿了。

sentences.english: I also invite several upfitter to look through my new apartment tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚，我还请了几个装修工去查看我了新房子。

sentences.english: The party tonight was crowded with wits and beauties.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的舞会才子佳人云集。

sentences.english: Tonight we saw a real tear-jerker.
sentences.chinese: 今晚我们看了一部十分令人感伤的电影。

sentences.english: I hear there is a (kegger) [beer party] at John's house tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我传闻今晚在约翰家里有一个啤酒集会。

sentences.english: It's too salty-tonight's dish, I must keep drinking more water.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的菜很咸，害得我饭后要不停的喝水。

sentences.english: I've already schooled you once tonight, homeboy.
sentences.chinese: 今晚我已经教训过你一次了，臭小子。

definition: very early in the morning/in the wee hours
